lead_paragraph: RIFKIN-COMRAS--Blanche. Passed away December 31, 2015 at the age of 99. Loving wife to the late Oscar Comras and Louis Rifkin; Dear sister to Gertrude Goldstein; Beloved mother to Madelyn Katz (Albert) and Donald Comras (Albert Husted); Adored grandmother of Jay Katz and David Katz (Lauren Hurvitz); Ecstatic great- grandmother of Sam Katz, Amanda Katz, Natalie Katz, CC Katz, and Lila Katz; Cherished aunt to all her nieces and nephews. A bundle of energy and pillar of the community, she worked tirelessly for: The Advisory Board of Jacobi Hospital; The Advisory Board of Einstein/Montefiore; Member of the Community Board 11 for 30 years; The Board of Directors of Bronx House; and National Council of Jewish Women. Services will be held at the Shalom Jewish Funeral Home, 1528 Castle Hill Avenue, Bronx on Sunday, January 3, 2016 at 11:30am. Interment: Mt. Hebron Cemetery. Donations in her name may be made to: www.bronxhouse.org or to: www.ujafedny.org. 1/3
